tool_description: With InGrav Global Sanction list, Stay compliant with the sanction authorities of the Americas, EMEA as well as APAC and other lists. Scan your existing customers and new leads against all sanctioned individuals and entities.
name: Global Sanction Search
title: Global Sanction Search

api_list.name: Search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-sanction-search.p.rapidapi.com/restpeople/MA/MaWcf.svc/FetchResult"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-sanction-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
